summary: The diff only updates project_state.json to record pending work; it does not add any generated logo assets, update UI logo usage, or change frontend/index.html head tags. As a result, REQ-1 and REQ-2 are not implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate a complete logo asset set from the uploaded image and add the resulting images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames specified (logo, favicons, apple touch icon, OG image).
missing_requirements.reason: No new files were added under frontend/public/assets/generated; the diff shows only a modification to project_state.json.
evidence: File diff summary: Added: 0, Modified: 1, Removed: 0

missing_requirements.requirement: Use the generated logo assets throughout the UI and HTML head: update header and landing page hero to use /assets/generated/kslab-logo.dim_512x512.png, and update frontend/index.html to reference the generated favicon, apple-touch-icon, and og:image assets.
missing_requirements.reason: No UI component files or frontend/index.html were modified; only project_state.json changed.
evidence: File diff summary: Added: 0, Modified: 1, Removed: 0

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated internal project tracking entries (AR-1/AR-2/AR-3), including a known issue about missing logo upload, without implementing any requested frontend asset/UI/index.html changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asks for generating assets and wiring them into the UI and HTML head; updating project_state.json with pending requests is not part of those requirements.
